cab.content: -US DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)iE C RET. .P. 141 (27).COPY KG.C A B I H E T.THE SITUATION IN CHINA, MAY 5TE, 1927.SANCTIONS.The accompanying Fifth Report by the Chiefs of Staff on sanctions in China is circulated to the Cabinet by direction of the Prime Minister with reference to Cabinet 29 (27), Conclusion (c), and Cabinet 30 (27), Conclusion 1 (b).Owing to the secret nature of the Report, it is requested that this copy may be returned to this Office when no longer required.(Sgd.) M.P.A. HAN KEY,Secretary to the Cabinet.2, Via it eh all Gardens, 3.W.I. May 9th 1927.
